sentence: It'll take them a while to get the boats organized...
I don't know about you, but I intend to write a strongly worded letter to the White Star Line about all this.
You're going to get out of this...
You're going to go on and you're going to make babies and watch them grow and you're going to die an old lady, warm in your bed.
Winning that ticket was the best thing that ever happened to me.
You must do me this honor...
That you will never give up...
Promise me now, and never let go of that promise.
